programme.title: Unsellable Houses
programme.desc: After his semi-hoarder house in a prime location sat on the market for months, it's getting handed over to the reluctant sisters. Lyndsay and Leslie transform problems into possibilities as they give this lackluster split level a contemporary facelift.

programme.title: Unsellable Houses
programme.desc: A young couple having trouble selling their older home ask Lyndsay and Leslie for help. The twins are challenged to keep the house's cozy character and add more charm to an aging property that's seen years of mish-mashed styles.

programme.title: Unsellable Houses
programme.desc: A daughter begs Leslie and Lyndsay to take over her mother's rambler after it sat on the market for three months. Using a few of their tricks, the twins change its dated and choppy layout by opening up the home and giving it a calming, coastal vibe.

programme.title: Unsellable Houses
programme.desc: A divorcee dials Leslie and Lyndsay to assist in selling his small home with some big obstacles. The sisters face the challenge by giving functionality to every space and mixing boho style with a bit of Southwest flair to pull in younger buyers.

programme.title: Unsellable Houses
programme.desc: A homeowner seeks Leslie and Lyndsay's help to sell her inconsistently styled midcentury modern house. By decking out a dreamy backyard oasis and trimming trees to show off the water and mountain vista, the twins clear the way for a high sales price.

programme.title: Unsellable Houses
programme.desc: Siblings struggling to sell their sister's home need Lyndsay and Leslie's expertise. The twins redefine the dated two-bedroom rambler into a modern three-bedroom farmhouse with a deck that will be enjoyed even on a rainy Pacific Northwestern day.

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home
programme.desc: Since buying their Las Vegas house as newlyweds, a couple's charming home is bursting at the seams with the addition of two kids and a mother-in-law. The home's vintage character is part of its charm but the old-school layout simply no longer works.

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home
programme.desc: A couple's home used to be the entertainment hub for their friends, but the addition of their daughter makes it feel like a children's play palace. Drew and Jonathan rework the space to create a home that's perfect for entertaining and raising a family.

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home
programme.desc: After welcoming their third child, a couple is struggling with the lack of space in their home. Jonathan and Drew rework the entire house so the family can stay in the home they love and the school district their eldest son needs.

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home
programme.desc: A couple with an incredible community have a cramped house that has stopped working. They need help reconfiguring their tight kitchen, overstuffed dining room and dated living room.

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home
programme.desc: Just as Drew and Jonathan begin renovating a couple's home, a tree falls on the property and demolishes the upper floor. With the timeline extended, the Brothers transform the entire house to give the family a safe and beautiful space.

programme.title: Vacation House Rules

programme.title: Vacation House Rules

programme.title: Love It or List It
programme.desc: A woman and her husband bought a one-story home after he was diagnosed with muscular dystrophy. Now she's made friends she loves and wants to stay in the community. He thinks they need a new house to prepare for a future with more medical obstacles.

programme.title: Fixer to Fabulous
programme.desc: Dave and Jenny Marrs transform the a family's historic, 1893 house. From turning an attic space into two bedrooms to completely renovating the kitchen and living area, they pull out all the stops to give the family of five their first home.

programme.title: Fixer to Fabulous
programme.desc: When Jenny's parents decided to make the move to Bentonville, Arkansas, from Florida, the Marrs were thrilled to have them closer, but after months of living under the same roof, it's time for Joan and Steve to have a fabulous dream home of their own.

programme.title: Fixer to Fabulous
programme.desc: Jenny and Dave are challenged to completely overhaul a historic Dutch Colonial home for a couple of farm owners and their two small children, while keeping the home's history and character.

programme.title: Fixer to Fabulous
programme.desc: A couple who loves New Orleans-style architecture asks Dave and Jenny transform their classic Craftsman into a Creole cottage. The duo work to remodel each room with unique touches like antique doors, gas lanterns and an airy front porch.

programme.title: Fixer to Fabulous
programme.desc: After seeing overhaul they did on her parent's house, a woman moving back to Bentonville knows that Dave and Jenny can create her dream home, too. The Marrs use her love of pink to craft the ultimate starter home that she'll never want to leave.

programme.title: Fixer to Fabulous
programme.desc: After moving 20 times in 28 years, a couple is ready to make the move into a recently purchased Victorian their last. The rooms are a hash of renovations past, so Dave and Jenny Marrs help turn this house into a modern home where they'll want to stay.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: After being away for 30 years, a woman dreams of retiring in the small town where she has fond memories of her childhood. With her all-in budget of $120,000, Erin designs an elegant home while Ben creates some unique builds including a laundry shoot.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: Virginia newlyweds look for a new place to call home in Mississippi. They have an all-in budget and a wish list that includes a banquette, a master bedroom and a spacious front porch.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: A couple trading in Oregon's cold weather for Laurel's humid climate is looking for a house with nature-inspired whimsy and historic Southern charm. Ben and Erin rise to the challenge of creating a storybook-style home that's truly one of a kind.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: Ben and Erin create a dream house with a stunning kitchen and garden for a local restaurant owner.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: A Canadian couple looks to purchase a vacation home that will one day become their retirement home. With an all-in budget of $140,000, Ben and Erin show them two Craftsman cottages.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: A couple is looking for a house where they can entertain friends in a walkable neighborhood. Ben and Erin give their pick a complete facelift by adding a coastal color scheme, built-in banquet and a back patio that's perfect for entertaining.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: A Georgia couple loves the outdoors as much as they love Laurel, and they're in need of a home with a big kitchen and lots of yard space for entertaining. Ben and Erin are determined to bring this couple's outdoorsy ways into the design of their home.

programme.title: Home Town: Takeover
programme.desc: Ben and Erin go behind the scenes of 'Home Town: Takeover' as they explain the color, style and design behind the residential renovations in Wetumpka, Alabama. With the help of some HGTV stars, they'll reveal what went into making each place feel special.

programme.title: Home Town: Takeover
programme.desc: In new and exclusive interviews, Ben and Erin reveal a step-by-step guide to small town revitalization. From choosing the right color for Main Street to celebrating the town's history, they spill the renovation secrets they've been storing for a decade.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: Erin's uncle, Danny, likes to go big when it comes to restoring old houses, and he's not concerned about the budget. Together with his son, Jim, Ben and Erin try to convince him that bigger isn't always better in a historical home renovation.

programme.title: Home Town

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: Newlyweds are ready to move out of a parents' garage apartment and into their first home together. With an all-in budget, these two local artists hope to find a house with a master suite, large open kitchen and plenty of room for entertaining.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: A couple moves from Arizona to Mississippi in search of a slower pace of life and their forever home. They have an all-in budget of $250,000 and a wish list that includes a home with historic Southern architecture and a spacious kitchen.

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa: Back to Basics
programme.desc: Ina Garten shares recipes that use her favourite good ingredients starting with good chocolate in her chocolate pecan meringue torte. Next, good maple syrup and lemon are turned into sublime side dishes including maple-roasted acorn squash.

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa: Back to Basics
programme.desc: Ina Garten shares her favourite herbs and tips for using them to amp up the flavour of dishes. Rosemary, oregano and mint highlight her Pork Souvlaki with Radish Tzatziki and Pitas for a delectable, easy meal.

programme.title: The Kitchen
programme.desc: Summer sauces are the star of the menu, starting with Katie Lee's sweet and spicy grilled chicken and cucumber salad and Geoffrey Zakarian's seared scallops with a caper honey sauce.

programme.title: Symon's Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: It's a burger gift from the Greek gods. Michael Symon's Greek heritage is on full display as he makes a grilled Lamb Burger with Tzatziki. His wife, Liz, concocts an Ouzo Spritz with pickled watermelon rind that pairs perfectly with Michael's burger.

programme.title: Symon's Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Only Michael Symon would think to make Moussaka on the grill, taking the Mediterranean casserole layered with meat, veggies and cheese sauce outside. His wife, Liz, joins him to create a light, complimentary side dish of grilled and steamed artichokes.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: The sun is shining, and Ree Drummond is doing some California-style cooking. She makes wine-roasted chicken with pistachio pesto pasta, vibrant cauliflower tacos with avocado crema and divine roasted grape and ricotta toasts.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond answers wildcard questions from friends, townsfolk and visitors to Pawhuska. She shares an over-the-top good seared rib eye Banh Mi Vietnamese sandwich and an awesome chicken quinoa bowl with roasted corn salsa.

programme.title: The Kitchen
programme.desc: The Kitchen heads outdoors as the hosts get their grill ready for spring and put some grilling gadgets to the test in a Tool Takedown.

programme.title: Symon's Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: It's time for brunch in Michael Symon's backyard. He makes homemade bagels with poppy seeds and sesame seeds, and his wife, Liz, whips up homemade cream cheese to go with them. Michael also makes planked everything bagel-spiced salmon.

programme.title: Guy's Ranch Kitchen
programme.desc: Guy Fieri gives his friends lemons, and they make anything but lemonade. Eric Greenspan stirs a citrusy Tom Collins, Antonia Lofaso lightens things up with puffy pavlova with lemon curd whipped cream, and Marc Murphy makes fried calamari with lemon aioli.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Amanda Freitag and Jet Tila are ready to compete, as they pit Italian chef Fabio Mura against Miami chef Nicole Votano. It's up to them to decide who has the chops to bring Bobby Flay down in his own kitchen.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Sunny Anderson is teaming up with Kimberly Schlapman to add one more award to her mantle: the Beat Bobby Flay Award.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: A smokehouse master and a Californian take on Bobby.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Austrian chef Daniel Angerer is out to prove that his last win over Bobby Flay was no fluke, while Jersey restaurateur Jamie Knott hopes to become the new star of Bobby's nightmares.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Fine-dining master chef Geoff Lazlo faces off against Cincinnati legend chef Daniel Wright, and both want to see Bobby Flay go up in smoke. Chef Josh Capon is joined by actress Teri Hatcher to make sure the chefs have the firepower to win.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: There's expertise in spades when Chopped regular Amanda Freitag and digital darling Laura Vitale arrive in Bobby Flay's arena.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Sara Haines tries to keep the winning streak alive when she teams up with Food Network's Anne Burrell to try to bring Bobby Flay down. Chefs Jonathan Dearden and Scott Drewno go head-to-head for a shot at Bobby's crown.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy uncovers surprising culinary discoveries. In Columbus, Ohio, a hidden gem inside a grocery store serves Nepalese-Tibetan specialties. A Mexican spot in Dallas serves seafood tacos and mole fries and another Dallas joint makes dishes from Afghanistan.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives

programme.title: Valerie's Home Cooking
programme.desc: Valerie Bertinelli and her buddy Faith Ford love to cook and test out recipes. Valerie decides to keeps things cool with a deliciously decadent lobster club sandwich and savory refrigerator pickles.

programme.title: Valerie's Home Cooking
programme.desc: Valerie is celebrating her son Wolf's music with friends, family and his favourite home-cooked meal. The menu includes cedar plank salmon with grilled cherry tomatoes, brown butter sautéed spinach with lemon and mini crab cakes.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree's making Ladd's favorite slap-up platter, the Farmer's Breakfast, with over easy fried eggs, a slab of honey-glazed ham, fried sausage and bacon.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree is testing delicious ideas for kitchen hacks to up her breakfast game. There's a shortcut to the divine with chocolate chip hazelnut pancakes, and she's going experimental with a crazy omelet in a bag.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: For Ree Drummond, it's out with the old and in with new favorites that are all quick and easy. She makes over a cowboy classic, Flank Steak with Herb Sauce and Three-Cheese Waffle Hash Browns.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond shares delicious eats to take along to parties, get-togethers and cookouts, starting with a grilled potato salad and pinwheels three ways. Then she whips up everyone's favorite queso with grilled veggies and quick and easy fruit tarts.

programme.title: Trisha's Southern Kitchen
programme.desc: After being on the road performing for more than three years, Trisha Yearwood is ready to spend some time with her family. She throws a family reunion to catch up and share some great food. Her menu includes grilled potato salad and back cheeseburgers.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: The ultimate portrait of our planet looks at the key factors that shape our natural history. In the Arctic spring, a mother polar bear and cubs have two weeks to cross the frozen sea. Time-lapse cameras capture the transformation created by floods.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: A tour of the mountain ranges reveals how animals rise to the challenge of mountain life. The snow leopard finds habitat in the largest glaciers of the world.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Follow the descent of rivers from their mountain sources to the sea. Witness unique and dramatic moments of animal behaviour, including a piranha frenzy and a showdown between otters and crocodiles.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Although often overlooked, caves are remarkable habitats with equally bizarre wildlife. This documentary provides a unique access to a hidden world of stalactites, stalagmites, snotites and troglodytes that brings a wealth of surprises.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Deserts cover one fifth of the planet and they are spreading every year. We think we are familiar with the Sahara and the Kalahari but what about the Gobi or the Atacama -so many deserts have hardly been explored.

programme.title: Rentistas x São Paulo
programme.desc: Pela 4ª rodada, o Rentistas recebe o São Paulo no estádio Centenario. Na 3ª colocação do grupo, o time uruguaio tem apenas 2 pontos. O Tricolor faz ótima campanha e busca mais uma vitória para consolidar a liderança.

programme.title: Atlético-MG x Deportivo La Guaira
programme.desc: Pela 6ª rodada do grupo H, o Atlético-MG recebe o Deportivo La Guaira no Estádio do Mineirão. O Galo busca manter a invencibilidade e garantir a primeira colocação geral do torneio. Já os de la Costa têm chances de garantir vaga na Sul-Americana.

programme.title: Show da Rodada do Espanhol
programme.desc: O programa traz todos os pormenores da rodada do campeonato espanhol com as pontuações dos clubes, gols e lances mais bonitos.

programme.title: Newcastle x Manchester City
programme.desc: Pela 36ª rodada, o Newcastle recebe o Manchester City no estádio St. James' Park. Jogo de festa para os visitantes: com a derrota do rival Manchester United para o Leicester na rodada, os Citizens já são campeões da temporada 2020/21.

programme.title: Texas
programme.desc: Do Texas Motor Speedway, em Fort Worth, Estados Unidos.

programme.title: Resenha ESPN
programme.desc: Acompanhe a resenha com quem mais entende do riscado: jogadores e ex-jogadores de futebol.

programme.title: Mundo Premier League
programme.desc: Após Manchester City e Pep Guardiola conquistarem seu terceiro título da Premier League em quatro anos, conheça a história do técnico catalão, com um olhar especial sobre os momentos-chave da temporada. Veja opiniões de torcedores do City.

programme.title: Flamengo x Vélez Sarsfield
programme.desc: Pela 6ª rodada do grupo G, o Flamengo recebe o Vélez Sarsfield no Maracanã. Em jogo valendo a liderança do grupo, o Rubro-Negro tenta manter a invencibilidade e a primeira posição. O Vélez, também classificado, tem três vitórias seguidas no torneio.

programme.title: Karim Arce x Daniel Cuellar
programme.desc: Veja a luta entre Karim Arce x Daniel Cuellar. Do Auditório Benito Juárez, em Los Mochis, México.

programme.title: Mundo Premier League
programme.desc: Após Manchester City e Pep Guardiola conquistarem seu terceiro título da Premier League em quatro anos, conheça a história do técnico catalão, com um olhar especial sobre os momentos-chave da temporada. Veja opiniões de torcedores do City.

programme.title: Eibar x Barcelona
programme.desc: Pela 38ª rodada, o Eibar recebe o Barcelona no Estádio Municipal de Ipurúa. Após sete anos na elite, os Armeros buscam se despedir de cabeça erguida. O Barça, por outro lado, já está classificado para a Champions, mas não tem mais chances de título.

programme.title: Liverpool x Crystal Palace
programme.desc: Pela 38ª rodada, o Liverpool recebe o Crystal Palace no Estádio Anfield Road. Após emocionante vitória na última rodada, os Reds só dependem de si para se classificar à Champions. Os Eagles não têm mais pretensões no torneio e tentam sua 13ª vitória.

programme.title: Villarreal x Manchester United
programme.desc: Villarreal e Manchester United disputam a final no Estádio Energa Gdansk, na Polônia. O Submarino Amarelo disputa sua primeira final internacional e tenta surpreender os favoritos. Já os Red Devils buscam seu segundo título da competição.

programme.title: Wec: 8 Horas de Portimão - Largada
programme.desc: Do Autódromo Internacional do Algarve, em Algarve, Portugal.

programme.title: Boca Juniors x Santos
programme.desc: Pela 2ª rodada do grupo C, o Boca Juniors recebe o Santos no estádio La Bombonera. Os boquenses vêm de ótima vitória fora de casa na estreia e tentam se vingar do rival que o eliminou na semi de 2020. Já o Peixe tenta se redimir após derrota em casa.

programme.title: Villarreal x Atlético de Madrid
programme.desc: Pela 25ª rodada, o Villarreal recebe o Atlético de Madrid no Estádio de la Ceramica. O time da casa não vence há, pelo menos, cinco partidas e tenta se recuperar. Os Colchoneros buscam abrir mais vantagem na liderança.

programme.title: Downhill
programme.desc: A family narrowly escape an avalanche during a ski weekend, causing them to re-evaluate their lives.

programme.title: The Wedding Date
programme.desc: When a single executive attends her sister's wedding where the best man is her ex-fiancée, she decides to hire a male escort to pose as her boyfriend.

programme.title: Dirty Dancing
programme.desc: While on vacation, a girl discovers love and romance with a local dance instructor.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: After her father is murdered, a 14-year-old girl hires the toughest U.S. marshal she can find to help her hunt down her father's killer.

programme.title: Basic Instinct
programme.desc: A detective falls for a seductive mystery writer who has written a novel mirroring the recent murder of her rock-star boyfriend. As their relationship progresses, the detective realizes all is not as it initially seems when it comes to his new girlfriend.

programme.title: Trick 'r Treat
programme.desc: On Halloween a college student may have met 'the one'; principal has a secret life.

programme.title: Tully
programme.desc: A mother with a newborn infant and two other children is exhausted and at the end of her rope, so when her brother offers to pay for a night nanny she takes him up on the offer. The two women soon form a strong bond over life, love and motherhood.

programme.title: Hours
programme.desc: A man's wife dies in childbirth in a hospital in New Orleans just as Hurricane Katrina hits. With his newborn daughter on a ventilator, the man must wait the storm out and hope to survive.

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pajamas
programme.desc: Through the eyes of an eight-year-old boy shielded from the reality of World War II, we witness a forbidden friendship that forms between the son of a Nazi commandant and a Jewish boy held captive in a concentration camp.

programme.title: Amistad
programme.desc: In 1839, a slave ship travels from Cuba to the U.S. carrying a group of African slaves. A mutiny erupts and they end up killing one of their captors. When they reach American land, they are imprisoned, but a lawyer takes on their case.

programme.title: The Kitchen
programme.desc: A group of gangsters are locked up and their wives continue the running of their illicit enterprises in 1970s Hell's Kitchen.

programme.title: Down a Dark Hall
programme.desc: A teenage girl compelled to enrol at the Blackwood Boarding School finds herself assailed by dark forces and the sinister headmistress.

programme.title: Brothers By Blood
programme.desc: A man struggles with his sister's death while the hierarchy of his family's criminal business puts tension on their dynamics.

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: A genetically engineered hit man is hired by an 'organization' that wraps him up in political conspiracy that has Interpol and the military chasing him. Agent 47's life is additionally altered when a woman stirs his conscience and emotions.

programme.title: 12 Strong
programme.desc: A U.S. Special Forces team is sent to Afghanistan to secure local allies following the terrorist attacks of 9/11. Led by their new captain, the 12 men struggle with the difficult terrain, a vast cultural divide and a numerically superior enemy.

programme.title: Last Knights
programme.desc: A banished knight, stripped of his title and livelihood, stands up against an evil ruler and avenges his fallen master.

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: An outlaw finds his life becoming all the more dangerous when he turns against a gang of criminals.

programme.title: Lost Boys: The Tribe
programme.desc: Chris tries to save his sister Nicole from transforming into a vampire.

programme.title: Mama
programme.desc: A man must raise his young nieces after they were abandoned in the forest for five years.

programme.title: Their Finest
programme.desc: As the war rages, a woman is hired to be a scriptwriter for morale-boosting films in London. She meets a dashing producer and, as bombs crash down around them, they attempt to make a movie that will warm the nation's hearts when they need it.

programme.title: Before Sunset
programme.desc: An author and a French woman reunite in Paris after nine years and reassess their lives.

programme.title: The Namesake
programme.desc: An Indian-American family tries to fit into American society.

programme.title: Airheads
programme.desc: Heavy metal trio The Lone Rangers haven't had much luck getting their songs heard. During their last desperate trip to a radio station, they bring along some genuine looking water pistols and hold the station hostage to get their demo on air.

programme.title: License to Drive
programme.desc: A teen decides to go for a night on the town despite flunking his driver's test.

programme.title: Good Boys
programme.desc: When a young boy is invited to his first kissing party, he asks his best friends to help him get ready, and along the way, they encounter mayhem and mischief.

programme.title: A Very Brady Sequel
programme.desc: The Brady family is tossed into turmoil when Carol's long-lost husband reappears.

programme.title: The Way Back
programme.desc: A former high school basketball prodigy accepts a coaching job for a chance at redemption.

programme.title: Misery
programme.desc: A successful romance novelist is nursed back to health and then held captive by a demented fan.

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: The Huntsman who was ordered to kill Snow White ends up becoming her mentor and protector.

programme.title: Black Christmas
programme.desc: One by one, sorority girls at Hawthorne College are being hunted and killed by an unknown stalker.

programme.title: The Rite
programme.desc: Inspired by the true events of a skeptical American seminary student, who travelled to Italy to take an exorcism course.

programme.title: Nurse 3D
programme.desc: A day nurse lures cheating men at night, murders them and exposes their secret.

programme.title: Shrink
programme.desc: Disillusioned with both his career and personal life, celebrity psychiatrist Henry's only hope of salvation comes from his first pro bono case.

programme.title: Bounce
programme.desc: An ad executive survives a plane crash when he gives up his flight to another man. He begins to fall for the man's widow, though she has no idea of his connection to her late husband.

programme.title: Beginners
programme.desc: A young man is shocked when his father makes two huge announcements: that he has a younger male lover and he's terminally ill with cancer.

programme.title: The Cider House Rules
programme.desc: A compassionate young man who was raised in an orphanage decides to leave and see the world.

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: The Huntsman who was ordered to kill Snow White ends up becoming her mentor and protector.

programme.title: Ad Astra
programme.desc: An astronaut departs on a mission to discover what happened to a previous expedition that included his father.

programme.title: John Q.
programme.desc: A man holds a hospital ER hostage when his son is denied care due to a lack of insurance.

programme.title: Skyline
programme.desc: Los Angeles citizens are drawn out of their homes by strange lights, while an extraterrestrial force threatens to swallow the earth's population.

programme.title: Birthday Girl
programme.desc: A banker purchases a Russian mail-order bride over the Internet, but when the lovely woman arrives, things do not go as planned.

programme.title: Tully
programme.desc: A mother with a newborn infant and two other children is exhausted and at the end of her rope, so when her brother offers to pay for a night nanny she takes him up on the offer. The two women soon form a strong bond over life, love and motherhood.

programme.title: Before the Devil Knows You're Dead
programme.desc: Two brothers decide to rob their own parents' jewellery store, causing chaos for everyone involved.

programme.title: Broken City
programme.desc: After being framed by the Mayor, an ex-cop seeks revenge and redemption.

programme.title: Rush
programme.desc: The 1970s rivalry between Formula One racers James Hunt and Niki Lauda.

programme.title: Phantom
programme.desc: The ill captain of a submarine is rushed into a classified mission with the hidden hope that he will fail.

programme.title: Showdown in Little Tokyo
programme.desc: In Little Tokyo, two police officers set out to stop a ring of crack cocaine smugglers.

programme.title: Just Mercy
programme.desc: Civil rights attorney Bryan Stevenson fights for justice and works to free a wrongly convicted prisoner from death row.

programme.title: The Blind Side
programme.desc: When an affluent family learns that a homeless teenager is attending their children's school, they invite him home and make him a part of their family. Under the guidance and nurturing of the family, the boy becomes a football star and an NFL prospect.

programme.desc: Buildings can be a major source of greenhouse gas emissions, but some people are putting in place building blocks for a sustainable future. We look at innovations in the construction industry that are changing the way we live, work, and play.

programme.title: The Brave Ones
programme.desc: Charts the rise of some of the world's most successful entrepreneurs through interviews.

programme.title: CNBC Debate
programme.desc: The global pandemic is hitting economies hard. The World Bank predicts most countries will fall into recession. CNBC's Geoff Cutmore joins world business leaders to debate the issues at this year's virtual World Economic Forum.

programme.title: CNBC Meets
programme.desc: He co-founded one of the biggest and most profitable internet companies in the world. Tencent's Charles Chen Yidan reveals the secrets of his start-up success, why his family always comes first, and why he works tirelessly to help provide education.

programme.title: The Edge
programme.desc: With demand for content increasing and more platforms than ever before, CNBC’s Elizabeth Schulze explores the latest technologies within the entertainment industry and examines how global audiences will be entertained in the future.

programme.title: CNBC Conversation
programme.desc: Nobel Prize-winning economist Joseph Stiglitz sits down with CNBC and takes aim at Apple, the Euro, banks, and the 'nightmare' of a potential Trump presidency and its implications for the US economy.

programme.title: Trailblazers
programme.desc: Jean Paul Gaultier becomes a tour guide in his home city of Paris. From the Folies Bergere to Musée des Arts Décoratifs, CNBC's Tania Bryer finds out where Gaultier hangs out in the 'City of Lights'.

programme.title: Lasting Legacy
programme.desc: Karl Scheufele is the billionaire owner of Swiss watchmaker Chopard, a business he bought in 1963. The Scheufeles, also a family of watchmakers themselves, have since transformed the Geneva-based company to the internationally known brand it is today.

programme.title: Managing Asia
programme.desc: Jollibee CEO Ernesto Tanmantiong talks to Christine Tan about its recent store openings in Manhattan and London, and his recipe to further grow the iconic brand into a top five global player.

programme.title: Blue Collar Millionaires
programme.desc: An Idaho man whose custom tow trucks haul in millions a year; an oil-and-gas expert who uses her mineral-mining know-how to pump out big profits; and a former Marine whose moving company has made him a true soldier of fortune.

programme.title: CNBC Conversation
programme.desc: Nobel Prize-winning economist Joseph Stiglitz sits down with CNBC and takes aim at Apple, the Euro, banks, and the 'nightmare' of a potential Trump presidency and its implications for the US economy.

programme.desc: With 2018 marking the first full Formula One season in a post-Bernie Ecclestone era, find out how marketing is helping the motorsport's new owners reverse the decline in fans and TV viewers around the world.

programme.title: Your Honor
programme.desc: Michael continues to use his power to obscure details of the accident as crime lord Jimmy Baxter and his wife Gina plot their revenge. Things aren't adding up for Lt. Nancy Costello in her investigation.

programme.title: Your Honor

programme.title: The Good Lord Bird
programme.desc: A young slave is freed by abolitionist John Brown and is welcomed into his ragtag army. The slave witnesses Brown's divinely inspired violent agenda: to free the land of slavery by any means necessary.

programme.title: The Good Lord Bird
programme.desc: Onion is taken under the wing of Pie, who instructs him in the ways of the world despite uncovering his dangerous secret. Onion soon finds himself enmeshed in a mounting slave insurrection where he learns the consequences of his own actions.

programme.title: The Good Lord Bird
programme.desc: Following the battle in Pikesville, John Brown, now one of the most wanted men in America, travels north with Onion to raise funds for the abolitionist cause. Following a conversation, Onion discovers just how complex the fight to equality really is.

programme.title: The Good Lord Bird
programme.desc: John and Onion continue their fundraising mission, this time heading to Canada on foot. Onion demands freedom from Brown's army, but when Harriet Tubman endorses Brown, Onion realizes that he may be more invested in the cause, and Brown, than he thought.

programme.title: The Good Lord Bird
programme.desc: Onion and new recruit John Cook head to Harper's Ferry to prepare for the arrival of John Brown and his army. However, Onion quickly struggles to perform his mission of recruiting more African-American soldiers.

programme.title: The Good Lord Bird
programme.desc: The plan to take control of the nation's largest armory at Harper's Ferry is finally put into action. However, a crucial mistake by Onion threatens the success of the entire operation.

programme.title: The Good Lord Bird
programme.desc: John Brown and his remaining army take a last stand as more federal troops descend upon Harper's Ferry. With John Brown captured and held for public execution, Onion, truly on his own, risks his life to say his goodbyes to Brown.

programme.title: No Country for Old Men
programme.desc: A welder finds $2 million at the site of a drug exchange near the border. Deciding to keep the money, he soon finds himself being chased by a psychotic killer who also wants the money. The hit man terrorizes his prey while being chased by a sheriff.

programme.title: Born on the Fourth of July
programme.desc: A small-town athlete enthusiastically enlists to fight in the Vietnam War and returns home, paralyzed from the chest down. After a nightmarish stint in a veterans' hospital, he pulls his life together and becomes an anti-war activist in the process.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: A U.S. Secret Service agent, who was unable to prevent Kennedy's murder, vows to stop a madman who plans to assassinate the president.

programme.title: The Untouchables
programme.desc: Federal agent Eliot Ness forms a fearless foursome to take on crime boss Al Capone.

programme.title: No Way Out
programme.desc: The secretary of defence and his loyal aid try to cover up the murder of a call girl.

programme.title: The Crying Game
programme.desc: After a kidnapped British soldier left in his charge is accidentally killed, IRA soldier Fergus flees to England, where he keeps his promise to look after the soldier's distraught girlfriend, with whom Fergus soon finds himself falling in love.

programme.title: The Captive
programme.desc: Eight years after the disappearance of a girl, incidents indicate she could be alive. Her parents and the police try to solve the mystery of her disappearance.

programme.title: Locke
programme.desc: A happy and successful construction manager leaves an important job in Birmingham one day and sets out for London. During the drive, he receives a phone call that sets off a series of events that threatens to unravel his entire life.
